page.title: 10SPORTS' DAY IN GILMORTON
page.content: Sports Day at Gilmorton School this year was rather unusual.Apart from a few running races all the races were fun ones.In previous years we have had a points system and the house with the most points wins the trophy.This year the 3As Awards determined who would win the trophy and Sports Day was just a fun day. At 1.30 all of the school went across to the sports field.The children sat by the hedge and the spectators sat in the middle.Just as we were about to start it poured with rain and we all had to rush back into school. After half an hour the rain stopped and we returned to the field. These are some of the races we enjoyed:water on the head,dressing-up,obstacle,wheel-barrow ,sack,camel,tug-of-war.It was a very enjoyable afternoon.
